inputNumberAndItsBaseOfANumberSystemAndA: Input number, its base of a number system and another base of a number system or 'x' to quit
inputArrayLengthOrNumberSequence: Input array length or number sequence or 'x' to quit
inputNthNumberOfFibonacci: Input nth number of Fibonacci or 'x' to quit
inputLengthOfPassword: Input length of password or 'x' to quit
